title: Heating + screen - Issue with recently bought Pixel 3XL
content:
Currently, I have two issues with the phone. 

1. The phone overheats while talking (near the top speaker).
2. There is a complete change in color (probably due to heating) of the device exactly at that same spot. I've attached pictures below. 

There isn't an issue with the software. I've already tried a reboot and a complete factory reset. I've looked for a proper update to the phone as well. It doesn't solve the issue.
